link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK(File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 播放列表图标
  2. 修复 在标签编辑器中处理超长标签时卡死或崩溃
  3. 修复 从后台启动时可能的崩溃
  4. 翻译 更新 波兰语(cooky)
  5. 开发 更新 AGP 至 8.6.1, 更新依赖
  6. 开发 清理代码
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: regression of playlists icons
  2. Fix: frozen or crashes when processing extremely long tag in Tag Editor
  3. Fix: possible crashes when starting from background
  4. Translation: update Polish (cooky)
  5. Development: upgrade AGP to 8.6.1, update dependencies
  6. Development: cleanup code

link.name: Github Release Modern Variant APK (File Download Link)
Github Release Legacy Variant APK(File Download Link)

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 在搜索结果、专辑详情、艺术家详情、流派详情中，创建播放列表时崩溃
  2. 新增 主抽屉菜单新增“退出”选项
  3. 改进 在任何情形下，都允许使用媒体通知退出
  4. 改进 播放列表内的搜索功能
  5. 翻译 更新 法语(manafy), 葡萄牙语(azilara), 西班牙语(Ulisses_Mello), 德语(jande75), 巴西葡萄牙语(FalaTudo)
  6. 开发 升级 Kotlin 至 2.0.20, 更新 AGP 至 8.6.0, 更新 Jetpack Compose 至 1.7.1, 更新依赖
  7. 开发 重构播放器
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: Crash when creating playlists in Search Results, Album Detail, Artist Detail, Genre Detail
  2. New: add "Exit" in Main Drawer Menu
  3. Improve: quiting from Media Notification in any circumstance
  4. Improve: Search function in Playlist Detail
  5. Translation: update French (manafy), Portuguese (by azilara), Spanish (by Ulisses_Mello), German (by jande75), Portuguese, Brazilian (by FalaTudo)
  6. Development: upgrade kotlin to 2.0.20, upgrade AGP to 8.6.0, upgrade Jetpack Compose to 1.7.1, update dependencies
  7. Development: refactor player

releaseNote.zh-cn:
1. 修复 可能的动画导致的罕见崩溃 [移植自 v1.7.0]
  2. 修复 艺术家详情中专辑排序 [移植自 v1.7.0]
  3. 修复 艺术家详情中切换彩色页脚开关时崩溃 [移植自 v1.7.1]
  4. 修复 睡眠定时器失效 [移植自 v1.7.2]
  5. 修复 从外部（如文件资源管理器）启动时未立即播放 [移植自 v1.8.0]
  6. 修复 Android Q 上通知图像质量过低 [移植自 v1.8.1]
  7. 修复 在某些罕见情况下跳转到艺术家详情时崩溃 [移植自 v1.8.2]
  8. 翻译 更新 巴西葡语(FalaTudo)，阿拉伯语(Ruger Blaze (hima_96)), 西班牙语(Dino RTX (rtxdino36))
  9. 开发 更新 Gradle 至 8.8，更新 AGP 至 8.5.1
releaseNote.en:
1. Fix: rare crash caused by color animation [backported from v1.7.0]
  2. Fix: albums sorting in Artist Detail [backported from v1.7.0]
  3. Fix: crash when toggling Colored Footers in Artist Detail [backported from v1.7.1]
  4. Fix: Sleep Timer not working [backported from v1.7.2]
  5. Fix: not instantly start playing from the external source (like file explorer) [backported from v1.8.0]
  6. Fix: low notification image quality on Android Q [backported from v1.8.1]
  7. Fix: crash when jumping to Artist detail in some rare circumstance [backported from v1.8.2]
  8. Translation: update PortugueseBrazilian (by FalaTudo), Arabic (by Ruger Blaze (hima_96)), Spanish (by Dino RTX (rtxdino36))
  9. Development: update gradle to 8.8, upgrade AGP to 8.5.1
